BBEX3.A.SDD.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Sudan / EUR 1 = SDD ... (buying)

General: The Sudanese pound (SDG) has been in circulation since 10 January 2007, when it was introduced at a rate of SDD 100 = SDG 1. The SDD remained legal tender alongside the SDG until 30 June 2007. For exchange rates from 2007, see BBEX2:A:SDG:EUR:CA:AA:A04.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
Comment on 2006: For exchange rates from 2007, see BBEX2:A:SDG:EUR:CA:AA:A04.
